advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..enthusiastic.description: 食用所有幻想乡的飨宴的食物
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..enthusiastic.title: 幻想乡美食家
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..hmm.title: 嗯姆...是这样吗?
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..redbean.description: 在砂土，泥巴或者粘土上种植红豆
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..redbean.title: 耐瘠薄赤小豆
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..soybean.title: 不可或缺的作物
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..sweet.title: 甜嘛?
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..tea.title: 清闲的副业
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..welcome_to_gensokyo.title: 幻想乡的飨宴
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..tea_master.title: 小罐茶，大师作
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..udumbara.description: 种植幻昙华。这种植物在月光下成长，在阳光下枯萎
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..udumbara.title: 月光作物
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..udumbara_flower.description: 获得幻昙花。幻昙华只在满月夜的月光下开花，开花10秒之后花将会凋谢
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..udumbara_flower.title: 昙花一现
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..alcoholic.description: 使用发酵桶酿酒并喝酒获得醉酒效果
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..alcoholic.title: 嗜酒如命
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..passed_out.description: 不断喝酒直到醉酒效果堆叠到最高级
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..passed_out.title: 烂醉如泥
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..cucumber.title: 翠绿色的新生
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..cucumber_top.description: 让黄瓜藤蔓攀爬绳子并长到3格高，然后收获最顶层的黄瓜
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..cucumber_top.title: 河童之里
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..grape.title: 甜蜜的藤蔓作物
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..grape_cut.description: 修剪一株成熟葡萄藤的枝叶，使其能够长得更大。记得在上方放置一排绳子，让新生的藤蔓有地方攀爬
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..grape_cut.title: 欲戴其冠，必承其重
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..grape_harvest.description: 收获葡萄枝条下挂着的葡萄果实
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..grape_harvest.title: 苦后甘来
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..squeeze.description: 在木盆中跳跃榨取葡萄汁
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..squeeze.title: 糯香葡萄汁
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..cuisine_board.title: 寿司学徒
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..foreign_sushi_master.description: 制作彩虹加州卷切片和铁火加州卷切片
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..foreign_sushi_master.title: 出口转内销
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..kaguya_hime.title: 竹中公主的故事
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..small_pot.title: 归家暖意
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..sushi_master.description: 制作金枪鱼大腹握寿司,夜雀的手握,鱼籽军舰,缤纷太卷切片
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..sushi_master.title: 寿司仙人
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..crab_grab.description: 试图把螃蟹装桶时被螃蟹抢走水桶
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..crab_grab.title: 横行霸道
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..max_steamer.description: 在第十八层蒸笼蒸一个物品
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..max_steamer.title: 十八层竹塔
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..steamer.title: 蒸汽腾腾
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..dish.description: 蒸一份盘装或竹筒菜。注意他们会严重阻碍蒸汽流动，导致别的蒸笼蒸得更慢
advancements.youkaisfeasts.advancements..dish.title: 蒸汽拦路虎
